cause.description:
Therapeutic Horseback Riding and Hippotherapy have been shown in many cases to significantly improve the physical, mental, and emotional state of the patient. These gentle animals' loving spirit allows them to help. However, hippotherapy and theraputic riding can be expensive and while some places offer oppertunities for those in certian financial circumstances, many do not. Every person who can benefit from hippotherapy and/or theraputic horsebackriding should be able to do so.
1. Any person who could benefit from hippotherapy and/or therapeutic horseback riding should be able to, regardless of financial status.
2. People need to be aware of the benefits of this therapy.
cause.mission: To raise money and awareness so that all people who can benefit from this therapy will have the oppertunity to do so.
cause.name: Horses Are Angels Who Traded Their Wings For Hooves - Therapeutic Horseback Riding
